Class Profile

java.lang.Object
Profile
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class Profile extends Object implements ActionListener
Profile class holds all information and methods which can be used in profile page.
Author:
Emirhan Cakir

  • Constructor Details

    • Profile

      public Profile()
      The constructor basically prepare system to put profile elements. Firstly it removes possible panels and adds related scroll pane.

  • Method Details

    • putMyContents

      public JPanel putMyContents()
      The method is called in constructor to put all contents to the scroll pane. Firstly it creates basic panel than put information of users-name,nickname...-.After that it takes all contents of user to put panel.
      Returns:
      profilePanel - this panels hold all contents,buttons,informations of user.

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
      The method is overriding to manage button reactions. All cases are explained through code via comment.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface ActionListener

    • openeditPage

      private void openeditPage(Object selectedValue)
      After the content which is wanted to edit is selected this method starts to execute. It disposes older frame and creates new frame to get information for edit operation.
      Parameters:
      selectedValue - is object which have selected field information in JList. Method gets name of the selected value with toString() method

    • openEditAccount

      private void openEditAccount()
      This method creates frame to edit account. User could change name,surname,hobbies,photo thanks to this method.

    • openFollowings

      private void openFollowings()
      The method constructs a new frame which have information of following list. It creates new frame firstly, then puts JList onto the frame.

    • openfollowers

      private void openfollowers()
      The method constructs new frame to put the nickname of all followers. It takes nickname via followerList which is HashMap, the puts into the JList.

    • openSettings

      private void openSettings()
      The method initialize a frame to put all setting options. It puts button to check reactions of the user.

    • openGroupList

      private void openGroupList()
      The method creates new frame which has name of the all attended groups. It takes names with for loop and then put them into JList. Also method adds "Go!" button to visit related group.
